name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Detail-oriented Backend Developer with over 10 years of experience in designing and delivering robust backend systems with a strong focus on **.NET**, **Spring Boot**, and **API Design**. Skilled in building scalable services in Agile environments and implementing data validation techniques to ensure high-quality outputs. Experienced in leveraging **AWS** for cloud-native architectures. Proven ability to create efficient APIs and automation tools, contributing to impactful projects with top-tier organizations, such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented robust backend solutions using **.NET** to enhance application performance and optimize resource management.
Designed and developed RESTful APIs in alignment with **API Design** principles to facilitate seamless data exchange across different systems.
Utilized **Spring Boot** framework to construct scalable microservices capable of handling over **10,000** requests per minute.
Managed cloud services using **AWS** for deploying applications and ensuring high availability and reliability in production environments.
Employed Agile methodologies to promote iterative development and collaboration within cross-functional teams, leading to a **20%** increase in project delivery speed.
Utilized **Angular** for building interactive user interfaces that improve user experience, achieving a **30%** reduction in load times.
Conducted thorough data validation processes to maintain high-quality standards in data integrity and accuracy under strict regulatory compliance.

• Developed backend systems using **.NET** and **Spring Boot** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and enhance complex reporting processes.
• Created event-driven microservices utilizing **API Design** principles with **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data and transaction requests.
• Managed the deployment of microservices on **AWS** and **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, ensuring consistent and scalable environments in a **9**-step deployment pipeline.
• Engineered data pipelines for the secure exchange of regulatory data, employing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to automate data flows, achieving a **30%** reduction in processing time.
• Conducted security audits, ensuring compliance with industry standards, and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication and secure access controls, improving security posture by **25%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile** environment to ensure seamless system integration, regulatory compliance, and successful release management, participating in **2-week** sprint cycles.

- Developed and maintained backend services utilizing **.NET** framework for efficient trade execution and account tracking, positively impacting trading operations by enhancing performance metrics by **15%**.
- Engineered real-time data processing solutions through **API Design** principles, ensuring seamless interactions between **Angular** frontend components and backend services, improving user experience by **20%**.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile** environment to create robust RESTful APIs, facilitating smooth data retrieval and transactions.
- Implemented comprehensive data validation processes, maintaining compliance with industry standards while exceeding regulatory requirements, notably achieving a **100%** compliance rate for MiFID II and GDPR.
- Introduced automated testing frameworks with **PyTest** and **mock servers**, increasing code reliability and reducing bug incidence in production by **30%**.
- Optimized backend task execution using job queuing solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, significantly improving processing speed by **25%** and ensuring high throughput for backend services.
